|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = 몬드성의 다이루크, 약속을 지키러 왔다. 잡담엔 낄 생각 없어. 큰일을 해볼 생각이라면 구미가 좀 당기는군
|vo_01_01_rm         = Mondeuseong-ui Dairukeu, yaksogeul jikireo watda. Japdamen kkil saenggak eopsseo. Keunireul haebol saenggagiramyeon gumiga jom danggineungun.
|vo_01_01_tl         = Diluc of Mondstadt, I came here to keep my promise. I have no intention to participate in chitchat. If we are about to do something big, I am interested, though.

|vo_02_01_title      = 잡담・휴식

|vo_02_01_tl         = It's good to relax sometimes.

|vo_06_01_title      = 우리에 대해・필요

|vo_07_01_title      = 「신의 눈」에 대해...
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = 앞길이 잘 보이지 않는 사람에게 「신의 눈」은 신이 내린 등불일 수도 있지. 하지만 신념을 가진 사람에겐 그저 있으나 마나 한 표창일 뿐이야
|vo_07_01_rm         = Apgiri jal boiji anneun saramege "Sin-ui Nun"eun sini naerin deungburil sudo itji. Hajiman sinnyeomeul gajin saramegen geujeo isseuna mana han pyochang'il ppuniya.
|vo_07_01_tl         = To a person whose path isn't seen well, a "Vision" can be light from God. But to those who have their own beliefs, it's just a commendation that has no big use.
|vo_07_02_title      = 하고 싶은 이야기...
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = 난 가끔 「천사의 몫」에서 직접 술을 만들어, 술집은 정보가 거래되는 곳이기 때문이지
|vo_07_02_rm         = Nan gakkeum "Cheonsa-ui Mok"eseo jikjeop sureul mandeureo, suljibeun jeongboga georaedoeneun gosigi ttaemuniji.
|vo_07_02_tl         = I sometimes brew wine by myself in "Angel's Share", since a bar is where information is traded.
|vo_07_03_title      = 흥미있는 일...
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = …부엉이야, 어둠 속에서 사냥감을 관찰하는 새, 최적의 타이밍에만 움직이고 빈틈이 전혀 없어
|vo_07_03_rm         = ...Bueong'iya, eodum sogeseo sanyanggameul gwanchalhaneun sae, choejeogui taiming'eman umjigigo binteumi jeonhyeo eopsseo.
|vo_07_03_tl         = ...An owl, a bird that observes its prey in the dark, only moves at the optimal timing and has no weak point.

|vo_08_01_title      = 케이아에 대해...
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Kaeya]]
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kaeya.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = 케이아… 그자가 하는 말은 반밖에 못 믿겠어
|vo_08_01_rm         = Keia... Geujaga haneun mareun banbakke mot mitgesseo.
|vo_08_01_tl         = Kaeya... I can only half-trust what he is saying.

|vo_08_02_title      = 리사에 대해...
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About [[Lisa]]
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Lisa.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = 리사, 기사단에서 가장 의지할 수 있는 일원이 될 수 있지. 그녀가 원한다면
|vo_08_02_rm         = Risa, Gisadaneseo gajang uijihal su itneun irwoni doel su itji. Geunyeoga wonhandamyeon.
|vo_08_02_tl         = Lisa, she can be the most dependable person in the Knights. If she wants to.

|vo_08_03_title      = 진에 대해・적
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Jean]]: Enemies
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Jean - Enemies.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = 무의미한 잡일은 진의 가장 큰 적이야
|vo_08_03_rm         = Mu'uimihan jabireul Jin-ui gajang keun jeogiya.
|vo_08_03_tl         = Useless chores is Jean's biggest enemy.

|vo_08_04_title      = 진에 대해・의무
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Jean]]: Responsibilities
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Jean - Responsibilities.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = 그녀는 과한 책임감 때문에 자신의 진정한 직책을 제대로 모르고 있어
|vo_08_04_rm         = Geunyeoneun gwahan chaegimgam ttaemune jasin-ui jinjeonghan jikchaegeul jedero moreugo isseo.
|vo_08_04_tl         = She doesn't know her true job due to excessive responsibility.

|vo_08_05_title      = 모나에 대해...
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Mona]]
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Mona.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = 몬드의 땅은 바람 신의 은총이 넘쳐서 점성술사를 동원해 수확을 예측할 필요가 없겠지
|vo_08_05_rm         = Mondeu-ui ttang'eun baram sin-ui eunchong'i neomchyeoseo jeomseongsulsareul dong'wonhae suhwageul yecheukhal piryoga eopgetji.
|vo_08_05_tl         = Mondstadt's lands are full of the Anemo Archon's grace, so there won't be need to predict harvest by hiring an astrologist.

|vo_08_06_title      = 디오나에 대해...
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Diona]]
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Diona.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = 디오나가 퉁명하게 굴어서 말 붙일 기회를 잡지 못했어. 가족의 원한이 걸린 거라면…. 음, 아냐? 그냥 술이 싫은 거라고? 몬드에서 술을 싫어하는 바텐더가 있을 줄이야
|vo_08_06_rm         = Dionaga tungmyeonghage gureoseo mal buchil gihoereul japji mothaesseo. Gajoge wonhani geollin georamyeon... Eum, anya? Geunyang suri sireun georago? Mondeueseo sureul sireohaneun batendeoga isseul juriya.
|vo_08_06_tl         = I couldn't get an opportunity to talk to Diona because she was being so curt. If it's related to family grudges... Hmm, no? She just hates alcohol? I didn't know there would be a bartender who hates alcohol in Mondstadt.

|vo_08_07_title      = 바르카에 대해…
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Varka]]
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Varka.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = 바르카 대단장, 나는 그의 입장을 이해할 수 있지만, 그의 방식은 인정할 수 없어. 흠… 내가 실언했네. 난 이젠 페보니우스 기사단의 기사가 아니니 내가 한 말은 잊어버려
|vo_08_07_rm         = Bareuka daedanjang, naneun geu-ui ipjang'eul ihaehal su itjiman, geu-ui bangsigeun injeonghal su eopsseo. Heum... Naega sireonhaetne. Nan ijen Peboniuseu gisadan-ui gisaga anini naega han mareun ijeobyeoreo.
|vo_08_07_tl         = Grandmaster Varka, I can understand his position, but I cannot acknowledge his ways. Hmm... it's just a slip of the tongue. I'm no longer a Favonius Knight, so forget what I said.

|vo_08_08_title      = 유라에 대해…
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Eula]]
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Eula.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = 그녀에 대해 들어본 적 있어. 자기만의 이념이 확고하더군. 가문의 속박에서부터 벗어나려는 기세도 인정할만해. 그런데… 그 페보니우스 기사단에 들어갔다니
|vo_08_08_rm         = Geunyeoe daehae dureobon jeok isseo. Jagimane inyeomi hwakgohadeogun. Gamun-ui sokbageseobuteo beoseonaryeoneun gisedo injeonghalmanhae. Geureonde... geu Peboniuse gisadane deureogatdani.
|vo_08_08_tl         = I have heard of her. She has a strong personal ideology. I can also acknowledge her spirit to break from the chains of her Clan. But... entering the Knights of Favonius.

|vo_09_01_title      = {name} 대해 알기・첫 번째
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = 무슨 일이야?
|vo_09_01_rm         = Museun iriya?
|vo_09_01_tl         = What's the matter?
|vo_09_02_title      = {name} 대해 알기・두 번째
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = 응, 기사단? 흥… 별로 할 말이 없어. 가려는 길이 다른 것뿐이야
|vo_09_02_rm         = Eung, gisadan? Heung... Byeollo hal mari eopsseo. Garyeoneun giri dareun geotppuniya.
|vo_09_02_tl         = Hmm, the Knights? Hmph... I don't have much to say. We just have different ways.
|vo_09_03_title      = {name} 대해 알기・세 번째
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 집사 말고 다른 사람과 대국을 하는 건 오랜만이군. 모처럼 한가한데, 한 판 하지
|vo_09_03_rm         = Jipsa malgo dareun saramgwa daegugeul haneun geon oraenmanigun. Mocheoreom hangahande, han pan haji.
|vo_09_03_tl         = It's been a while since I have had a go of chess except with my butler. Since I'm free in a while, let's have a match.
|vo_09_04_title      = {name} 대해 알기・네 번째
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 체크메이트, 날 이렇게 몰아붙이다니, 제법이군
|vo_09_04_rm         = Chekeumeiteu, nal ireoke morabuchidani, jebeobigun.
|vo_09_04_tl         = Checkmate, cornering me like this, you're pretty good.
|vo_09_05_title      = {name} 대해 알기・다섯 번째
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 자네 꽤 실력 있군. 체스도 그렇고, 함께하는 전투도 아주 믿음직해. 아니… 이런 협력관계는 나한테도 신기해…. 그럼 앞으로도 함께하지, 「친구」
|vo_09_05_rm         = Jane kkwae sillyeok itgun. Cheseudo geureotgo, hamkkehaneun jeontudo aju mideumjikhae. Ani... ireon hyeopryeokgwangeneun nahantedo singihae... Geureom apeurodo hamkkehaji, "Chingu".
|vo_09_05_tl         = You have quite some skills. Not only chess, but also the combats I have with you are very trustworthy. No... this kind of cooperation relationship is novel to me as well... Then let's work together in the future too, "Friend".

|vo_10_01_title      = {name}의 취미...
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = 와이너리의 그 예술품? 그건 내 게 아니야, 선친께서 수집하신 것들이지
|vo_10_01_rm         = Waineori-ui geu yesulpum? Geugeon nae ge aniya, seonchinkkeseo sujiphasin geotdeuriji.
|vo_10_01_tl         = The artworks in the Winery? Those aren't mine, but what my father collected.
|vo_10_02_title      = {name}의 고민...
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = 정말로 쓰러뜨려야 할 적, 죄악으로 뒤덮인 「어둠」은 검이 아닌 다른 수단으로 절단해야 하지…
|vo_10_02_rm         = Jeongmallo sseureotteuryeoya hal jeok, joeageuro dwideopin "Eodum"eun geomi anin dareun sudaneuro jeoldanhaeya haji...
|vo_10_02_tl         = The real enemy we should defeat, "Darkness" covered with sin, should be severed with another means than swords...
|vo_10_03_title      = 좋아하는 음식…
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = 잔에 든 게 무슨 술이냐고? 포도 주스일세, 보통 이걸 마시지
|vo_10_03_rm         = Jane deun ge museun surinyago? Podo juseuilse, botong igeol masiji.
|vo_10_03_tl         = What alcohol is in the cup? It's grape juice, I usually drink this.
|vo_10_04_title      = 싫어하는 음식…
|vo_10_04_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = 난 술을 좋아하지 않아. 그냥… 술맛이 싫어
|vo_10_04_rm         = Nan sureul joahaji ana. Geunyang... sulmasi sireo.
|vo_10_04_tl         = I don't like alcohol. I just... hate its taste.

|vo_11_01_title      = 선물 획득・첫 번째
|vo_11_01_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_11_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = 정교한 요리군. 계속 생각날 맛이야
|vo_11_01_rm         = Jeonggyohan yorigun. Gyesok saenggaknal masiya.
|vo_11_01_tl         = Exquisite food. It's a taste I will remember from time to time.

|vo_11_02_title      = 선물 획득・두 번째
|vo_11_02_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_11_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_11_02_tx         = 요리사의 노력이 느껴져. 나쁘지 않아
|vo_11_02_rm         = Yorisa-ui noryeogi neukkyeojyeo. Nappeuji ana.
|vo_11_02_tl         = I can feel the hard work of the cook. Not bad.

|vo_11_03_title      = 선물 획득・세 번째
|vo_11_03_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_11_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_11_03_tx         = …고마워
|vo_11_03_rm         = ...Gomawo.
|vo_11_03_tl         = ...Thank you.

|vo_12_01_title      = 생일…
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = 생일 축하해. 오늘은 너의 소중한 날이야. 네 소원을 말해봐. 내가 할 수 있는 일이라면 한번 생각해보지
|vo_12_01_rm         = Saeng'il chukhahae. Oneureun neo-ui sojunghan nariya. Ne sowoneul malhaebwa. Naega hal su itneun iriramyeon hanbeon saenggakhaeboji.
|vo_12_01_tl         = Happy birthday. Today is your precious day. Tell me your wish. If it's what I can do, I'll think about it.

|vo_13_01_title      = 돌파의 느낌・기
|vo_13_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx         = 목표 달성을 위해 힘은 반드시 필요해
|vo_13_01_rm         = Mokpyo dalseong'eul wihae himeun bandeusi piryohae.
|vo_13_01_tl         = Strength is needed to accomplish one's goal.
|vo_13_02_title      = 돌파의 느낌・승
|vo_13_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx         = 나아가는 길에 뭐가 있냐고? 그런 건 별로 신경쓰지 않아.<br />누가 앞을 가로막고 있다 해도 난 전진해야 돼
|vo_13_02_rm         = Na'aganeun gire mwoga itnyago? Geureon geon byeollo singgyeonsseuji ana.<br />Nuga apeul garomakgo itda haedo nan jeonjinhaeya dwae.
|vo_13_02_tl         = What's there while I go foward? I usually don't mind those much.<br />Even though someone is blocking my way, I must go foward.
|vo_13_03_title      = 돌파의 느낌・전
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = 힘이 강해졌어…. 아직 부족하지만, 전방을 향한 탐색은 멈출 수 없어.<br />「여명」이 오기 전 「어둠」을 조금이라도 밝힐 사람이 있어야 해
|vo_13_03_rm         = Himi ganghaejyeosseo... Ajik bujokhajiman, jeonbang'eul hyanghan tamsaegeun meomchul su eopsseo.<br />"Yeomyeong"i ogi jeon "Eodum"eul jogeumirado balkil sarami isseoya hae.
|vo_13_03_tl         = My powers became stronger... It's still not enough, but I can't stop exploring what's in front of me.<br />Before "Dawn" comes, there should be a person who could at least light up the "Dark" for a bit.
|vo_13_04_title      = 돌파의 느낌・결
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = 난 악을 소탕하려면 기나긴 밤을 홀로 걸어야 한다고 생각했어.<br />하지만 네 의지에 내가 틀렸다는 걸 또 한 번 깨달았지. 「동료」, 고마워
|vo_13_04_rm         = Nan ageul sotangharyeomyeon ginagin bameul hollo georeoya handago saenggakhaesseo.<br / >Hajiman ne uijie naega teullyeotdaneun geol tto hanbeon kkaedaratji. "Dongryo", gomawo.
|vo_13_04_tl         = I thought I had to walk the long night by myself if I want to extinguish evil.<br />But I realized I was wrong again thanks to your will. Thank you, "Colleague".
}}
